message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. I'd be happy to pay $100 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $120.
